DOC.criteria: For information regard BMS clinical trial participation , please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com Subject chronically infect HCV genotype 1 ( GT1 ) Subject without cirrhosis compensate cirrhosis ( Child Pugh Class A ) HCV RNA ≥ 10,000 IU/mL screen Treatmentnaïve subject previous exposure interferon formulation ( ie , IFNα , pegIFNα ) , Ribavirin ( RBV ) , HCV DAA ( protease , polymerase inhibitor , etc . ) Interferon ( IFN ) experience subject receive previous treatment IFNα , without RBV Liver transplant ( include hematopoietic stem cell transplant ) cornea hair ; Current known history cancer ( except situ carcinoma cervix adequately treat basal squamous cell carcinoma skin ) within 5 year prior screen ; Documented suspect hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) , evidence previously obtain image study liver biopsy ( screen image study/liver biopsy perform ) ; Evidence decompensated liver disease include , limited , radiologic criterion , history presence ascites , bleed varix , hepatic encephalopathy
